thread.title: SeatAdvisor and Payment Express at the Front of the Line for EMV Compliance
thread.title_full: SeatAdvisor and Payment Express at the Front of the Line for EMV Compliance

author: admin
title: SeatAdvisor and Payment Express at the Front of the Line for EMV Compliance
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 9:49 AM   SeatAdvisor, Inc. 
SAN DIEGO, Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SeatAdvisor, Inc. today announced a partnership with Payment Express for the purposes of assisting customers in obtaining EMV compliant payment solutions that seamlessly integrate with the SeatAdvisor Box Office (SABO) back-office sales flow. Both companies are innovation leaders in their respective industries. 
"Our customers require streamlined box office sales and reporting activities. I am pleased that we were able to develop the EMV integration with Payment Express prior to the compliance dates so that we can continue meeting the needs of our customers," said Brent Miller, CEO, SeatAdvisor, Inc. For more information about the integrated solution, visit www.seatadvisor.com/integrated-emv/ or contact SeatAdvisor. 
Of the announcement Carlo Delnero, Sales Executive, Payment Express said, " Payment Express is a world leader in proprietary payment gateway platforms. Our product is Level 1 PCI-DSS compliant which exceeds bank grade architecture, and requirements for EMV. Today's market and regulation is demanding a reliable, time-tested product to ensure complete EMV compliant fraud protection for their future business without hang-ups. We have dedicated many years clearing the hurdles that many companies still have yet to face when it comes to implementing and supporting this new technology, and we are excited to be doing this for SeatAdvisor." 
Payment Express is certified with Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Discover and Diners, providing a global end to end payment platform that facilitates electronic payments seamlessly. For a list of processors supported by Payment Express and SeatAdvisor, please go to www.paymentexpress.com/Knowledge_Base/Connectivity.aspx and click on your country. SeatAdvisor customers interested in securing a payment express account can visit sec.paymentexpress.com/pxmi/apply 
About SeatAdvisor: SeatAdvisor, Inc. is a global ticketing software company dedicated to providing organizations and venues with a powerful and affordable box office solution called SABO (SeatAdvisor Box Office). SABO includes Ticketing, Fundraising, Marketing, CRM and Resale functionality. SeatAdvisor, Inc. maintains global headquarters in San Diego, CA. The SABO system is used by thousands of venues worldwide with clients in the US, Australia, Europe, Canada, Singapore, Malaysia and the Caribbean. www.seatadvisor.com/integrated-emv/ 
About Payment Express: Payment Express is a high growth, innovative global leader in payment technology, providing PCI DSS compliant payment solutions, and is certified with all major card associations. Unique in its field, Payment Express develops and owns all the key designs and intellectual property to facilitate all aspects of transaction capture in any channel - A global end to end platform for e-commerce, retail and unattended that facilitates payments in real time. For more detailed information contact the Payment Express sales office at +1 213.378.1198 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/seatadvisor-and-payment-express-at-the-front-of-the-line-for-emv-compliance-300150860.html 
SOURCE SeatAdvisor, Inc.
